metadata.subject: Re: Since you are super well connected...

relationships.description: Serazzi seeks Epstein's opinion on political strategy, indicating respect for his views
Serazzi claims to have attended Wharton with Donald Trump Jr.

analysis.purpose: To share political analysis and strategy suggestions for Hillary Clinton's campaign ahead of debates
analysis.significance: Shows Epstein's circle discussing high-level political strategy and European/American political parallels

notable_quotes: In Europe a LOT of citizens start becoming very angry and voting for populist parties... envy sets in (especially with raising inequality that is perfectly normal when financial returns of rich people are exponential and work returns are linear)
I have seen with friends how irrational and influenceable masses can become in voting when they are frustrated (Hitler was elected after all...)
lets see how he handles the debate tonight. he should apologize to hillary and ask her to do the same

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present in this political discussion

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or evidenced in this email exchange

public_knowledge.context: Discussion of 2016 presidential election and European political trends that were widely covered in media

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Gianni Serazzi and Jeffrey Epstein discussing political strategy for Hillary Clinton's campaign, analyzing European populist trends as a warning for American politics, and commenting on the upcoming presidential debate.
